about_the_game:
The official digital client of the card game Algomancy. Definitely still a work in progress.

Our plan is to release an early version of the client that is lightly rules enforced as soon as possible to allow matches to take place. The full release later on will have complete rules enforcement.

Key points about Algomancy:

  • Turns are global (so neither player goes first, no play/draw disparity)
  • Hands are drafted during the game (no decks needed in the draft mode)
  • Cards are simple but extremely modular (most cards have 1-2 lines of text)
  • The Deterministic resource system ensures players can always play the game
  • Region limited interaction enables parallelized multiplayer gameplay
  • You get all the game cards at once! Absolutely no grinding for content.
